name: Super Cylinder Shooter
description:
Play in the browser ! A shooter game with several levels to unlocks !

Eliminate all enemies and collects all Super Coins to complete a levels

Can you finish the last level ? Pretty hard if you want to know

Not amused by my levels ? Make your owns levels with the in-game levels editor !

Controls:

  • Move with ZQSD or Arrow keys
  • Aim  around with mouse
  • Shoot balls with left click

More infos:

  • You need to collects all silver coins and eliminate all enemies in order to unlock the next levels.
  • Blue coins are pills that increase your shooting rate by 4 ,  for 5 seconds. It activate as soon as you touch them.
  • White coins with a green "+" are heals. It heals 50 hp (You start with 300 hp).
  • Turrets enemies can be pushed by the player or others moving enemies.

Credits:

  • Logo made by Ednaval
